name: K Prince
text: Most of the time they have pizza ready. Occasionally, we have to wait a few minutes, but I‚Äôm ok with that because the pizza is fresh and hot. Once though, last summer, there was a fly on my pizza . I didn‚Äôt notice until I got home. Yuck!

text: I have been to this LC before and the pizza is not bad and inside is spacious.. But on a  Saturday, the customer service was awful. They have nothing made and asked how long would it take to make bread. They acted like they didn't want to ‚Ä¶More

name: Sarah Mac
text: The food was good but the 4 stars is for cleanliness. They have several hand sanitizer stations that have dust on them because they haven't been filled in forever. That may not seem bad but it's flu season.. Be safe and wash your hands or keep sanitizer on you if you visit hereüëçüèæ

name: Rosemary Wright
text: Best Caesar's hands down. Consistently great, saucy and cheesy. Always pleasant at the counter. Even if you have a wait it's never that long. Heard as of May 2019 no more Caesar's on Benning, what a shame! The facility was so-so, but pizza and other food was consistently great! You will be missed Little Caesar's üôÉ

name: Antonio Jackson
text: They have a decent lunch buffet. It's all pizza and bread sticks. Would be better if there was salad and pasta to go along with the pizza buffet.

name: Austin Bryan
text: Good price for pizza. And derive is always good.

name: Daniel Gaston
text: The pizza is okay, but the price is unbeatable. They almost always have pepperoni and cheese pizza ready to go so there is no wait when you walk in and order. They are conveniently located in the middle of main post.

name: Cody Maile
text: Been here several times. Thin crush pizza is amazing. Employees are always friendly and have great attitudes.

name: Nick Mattingly
text: This Little Caesars is a bummer. Food is typical as to what you'd receive from a Little Caesars. They offer lunch buffet during the week, $7.50ish per adult. But they dont have a huge variety of pizza to be offered. They were out of ‚Ä¶More

name: Danyelle Feldhahn
text: Friendly staff, quick service, cheap prices, good pizza.

name: Polgara Mande
text: I ordered three pizza at 2:38 pm and was told it would be ready at 2:55pm. I got there and no pizza was ready. After I paid for it they decided to make it . One of the girls kept wiping her nose with her hands. Not ordering there again.

name: Andrew Schmidt
text: Great location. Offers lunch buffet. I think I got charged $6 for a $5 hot and ready. Don't know if that is the aafes charge or if they still pay tax.
